snippet: A recent Supreme Court case may have travelers wondering what could get them removed from a frequent flier program. Here’s some guidance.
abstract: Recent Supreme Court case may have travelers wondering what could get them removed from a frequent flier program; in general, most frequent flier contracts state that airlines have the right to terminate membership at any time if misuse for violation occurs; some guidelines for travelers highlighted.
lead_paragraph: A recent Supreme Court case may have travelers wondering what could get them removed from a frequent flier program. Here’s some guidance.

headline.main: Losing Your Membership in the Frequent Flier Club
headline.print_headline: What It Takes to Lose Your Membership in the Club
